title: Biden's national security adviser says ISIS threat against Kabul airport is 'real' and 'acute'
content:
1. Biden's national security adviser says ISIS threat against Kabul airport is 'real' and 'acute'  CNN
  2. American mom trapped by Taliban describes horrific violence, pleads for Biden to solve evacuation crisis  Fox News
  3. Potential ISIS Threat looms As Kabul Airport Evacuation Continues  NBC News
  4. Progress was always fitful. Many Afghan women felt unsafe before the Taliban’s arrival  The Guardian
  5. America enabled Afghanistan's corruption for years. The Taliban knew it.  NBCNews.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バイデンの国家安全保障顧問、カブール空港に対するISISの脅威は「現実」であり「深刻」であると発言
拜登的国家安全顾问称ISIS对喀布尔机场的威胁是 "真实的 "和 "严重的
拜登的國家安全顧問稱ISIS對喀布爾機場的威脅是 "真實的 "和 "嚴重的
